name: Mindy's Macaroni Salad
author: TIMSGAL
summary: I remember my mom making the best macaroni salad when I was a kid. I wanted to make mine similar to hers, but added a few things I like, such as pimiento, vinegar, and a gherkin for a little tartness to balance out the sweetness. My husband, who doesn't really like pasta salads, loves this!
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Place macaroni in the pot, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente
Drain and rinse under cold water
In a large bowl, mix the macaroni, celery, sweet onion, pimentos, and pickle
In a separate bowl, mix the creamy salad dressing, mustard, vinegar, sugar, and salt
Stir dressing into the macaroni mixture
Chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours before serving
